name: Misguided Mind
description:
The game is about a little satanic goat who at one point realizes that something has to be sacrificed. 

Short game, about - 20 minutes gameplay

Content warning: This game contains flashing images, cartoon scenes of violence with blood.

Controls: WASD - movement, Space - next dialog, E - interact, Esc - pause

Features:

  • Interactive environment.
  • 6 main characters and one secret character.
  • 2 Endings.
  • Short story

This game was created in 72 hours by me for Mini jam 110

Help with sounds: Chaomity

Pixel art title: KasterNM
